bach.Series.apply_func¶

Series.apply_func(func, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Apply the given functions to this Series. If multiple are given, a list of multiple new series will be returned.

Parameters

  • func (Union[str, Callable, List[Union[Callable, str]]]) – the function to look for on all series, either as a str, or callable, or a list of such

  • args – Positional arguments to pass through to the aggregation function

  • kwargs – Keyword arguments to pass through to the aggregation function

Warning

You should probably not use this method directly.
